casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Karen Elaine EVERETT. No. 350A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Thomas G. Meacham, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC. Amos Granger Tyndall, Chapel Hill, for Everett.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Attorney General on the 7th day of July 2006 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th day of August 2006."
